name: TopicsMaster
0:
”Alexa, open Topics Master.”
”Alexa, ask Topics Master to give me a topic.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: topics master
des: Impromptu speaking is an important part of our daily lives, from answering questions at work to having conversations with others. By giving you a random topic to discuss for 1-2 minutes, this Skill helps you improve your public speaking abilities in situations where you don't have time to prepare.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
